channel.title: Easy but fun rs glitch
channel.description:
Wanna be level 1000+?
This is the glitch for you.
Well go into burthope games room with a spinning plate a tele tab (varrock, most people there) and then what you do is challange someone to a game like draught. Then resign after the game has started. Stay in the room you are transferd too. Then spin the plate, but while it's spinning go to quick chat and click ? button untill the plate stops spinning(1 more click after the end of spinning) Then a menu will popup. Don't close it. (In the begging take run off) Now while it's open tele to varrock, when you get to varrock the screen will be there. Walk around for a second or 2 and ask people what your level is. They'll say like lvl 884 or 1050 in white letters. They'll start following you. Fun glitch. But if you close the screen your level will go away back to normal. Have fun :[].
Sorry for the form of paragraph.

item.title: Easy but fun rs glitch
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Wanna be level 1000+?

This is the glitch for you.

Well go into burthope games room with a spinning plate a tele tab (varrock, most people there)
and then what you do is challange someone to a game like draught. Then resign after the game has started.
Stay in the room you are transferd too. Then spin the plate, but while it’s spinning go to quick chat
and click ? button untill the plate stops spinning(1 more click after the end of spinning) Then a menu will popup. Don’t close it. (In the begging take run off) Now while it’s open tele to varrock, when you get to varrock the screen will be there. Walk around for a second or 2 and ask people what your level is. They’ll say
like lvl 884 or 1050 in white letters. They’ll start following you. Fun glitch. But if you close the screen your level will go away back to normal. Have fun :[].
